title: Drone attacks by Ukraine halt traffic at airports across Russia
cleaned_sentences: Support from readers like you keeps The Journal open.
You are visiting us because we have something you value.
Independent, unbiased news that tells the truth.
Advertising revenue goes some way to support our mission, but this year it has not been enough.
If you've seen value in our reporting, please contribute what you can, so we can continue to produce accurate and meaningful journalism.
